sections.body: Esheyna has always had a knack for spotting the weak points in structures, a talent she has long put to use to sabotage enemy siege engines. Now a legendary mercenary, she enjoys bashing apart teams of iron golems just to see how they're supposed to fit together.
Esheyna might battle the PCs for control of an ancient juggernaut just so she has bragging rights about destroying it.
Esheyna offers advice and assistance to the PCs about ancient war machines or clockwork invaders from another plane.
